page.title: 08MRS. CRUST OF HALTON
page.content: Mrs.Crust has lived in Halton Holegate for over 60 years.She was born in the farmhouse where her son now lives. there was a lot of work to do on the farm because everything was done by hand,even pumping the water.Shire- Horses were bred to help with the work and more men were employed because there were no tractors.The Church has not changed except for the lights which are now run by electricity.There used to be a bridge over the Hollow- Gate from the Rectory to the Church. The School had about 38 children who stayed there until they were 14.There were 2 shops,a Post Office,a Pub and a mens reading room in Halton Holegate now there is only a Pub.The train also used to go from Halton Holegate to Skegness and Spilsby but not anymore.
